user.name: user
user.searchText: Search by username, fullname or email

validate.usernameEmpty: Username is not allowed to be empty.
validate.usernameContainSpecialCharacters: Username can only contains lowercase characters, numbers and _
validate.usernameInvalidLength: Username can only contains from 3 to 256 characters
validate.oldPasswordEmpty: Old Password is not allowed to be empty.
validate.passwordEmpty: Password is not allowed to be empty.
validate.passwordInvalid: Password contains at least 1 lowercase character, 1 uppercase character, 1 number, 1 special character {'!@#$%^&*'} and min length is 8 characters.
validate.passwordNotMatch: Password and confirmation password do not match.
validate.fullnameEmpty: Fullname is not allowed to be empty.
validate.emailEmpty: Email is not allowed to be empty.
